description: Try our easy to follow Lamb Couscous Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Grain salad,Seafood free,Soy free,Tree nut free,Lamb,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Lamb Couscous Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place couscous into a large bowl with 2 tsp oil and a pinch of salt. Add 1/2 cup boiling water and stir well to combine. Set aside for 10 minutes then fluff with a fork.
Meanwhile, whisk 2 tsp lemon juice with 1 tbs oil and season with salt and pepper. Stir in yoghurt and chopped mint. Set aside.
Add zest, capsicum, rocket, olives and onion to couscous with remaining lemon juice and oil and toss well.
Top couscous salad with pomegranate and extra mint. Serve with lamb and yoghurt dressing.
